#### Normal

example form lecture 1

```{r, echo=TRUE}
#| label: fig-norm.dist
#| fig-cap: Corresponding PMF and CDF
#| layout-ncol: 2

curve(dnorm(x, mean = 1, sd = 1), xlim = c(-4, 4),
bty = 'l', ylab = 'density',
col = 'steelblue2', lwd = 2)
abline(v = 1, lty = 2)

curve(pnorm(x, mean = 1, sd = 1), xlim = c(-4, 4),
bty = 'l', ylab = 'cumulative probability',
col = 'steelblue2', lwd = 2)
abline(h = 1, lty = 2)
```
